
NAME LowerDNA
TYPES LOWER_TERMINUS

BEGIN_SELECTOR
PROPERTY DNA
NOT VARIANT_TYPE LOWER_TERMINUS
END_SELECTOR

BEGIN_CASE

SET_POLYMER_CONNECT LOWER NONE

## need to do this since lower-connect will not exist
## O1P was built off of the lower-connect

SET_ICOOR  O1P  -64.027359   76.329353    1.607808   P     O5*   C5*

ADD_PROPERTY LOWER_TERMINUS

END_CASE
